scenes.action_text: BLACK SWAN Written by Mark Heyman, Andres Heinz & John McLaughlin January 11, 2010 1 INT. DARK STAGE - NIGHT 1 OPENING CREDITS: A SPOTLIGHT slices black space. In its beam, a DANCER materializes. She is fair-skinned. Beautiful and pure. The maiden twirls on pointe, a smile on her face, light as air and carefree. She pauses, her face grows worried.
